## Introduction

This page contains the example scripts for analyzing the structure of individual proteins. The scripts are written in Python and use the [ProDy](http://prody.csb.pitt.edu/) package. The scripts are provided as a part of the [ProDy tutorial](http://prody.csb.pitt.edu/tutorials/).

## Downloading the scripts

The scripts can be downloaded from the [GitHub repository](http://github.com/PhenoMeters/AlphaMeter/tree/main/examples/StructuralAnalysis.py
).
